mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_STATE, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_SUBJECT, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_READCNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) RNUM FROM NOTICE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_STATE, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_READCNT, NOTICE_SUBJECT, NOTICE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( NOTICE_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 1, 'ADMIN', 0, #{NOTICE_SUBJECT}, #{NOTICE_CONTENT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_READCNT = NVL(NOTICE_READCNT, 0) + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{NOTICE_NO}
